schemaVersions.applySql: create table playlists (id integer primary key autoincrement, name text, cover_path text)
create table playlist_images (id integer primary key autoincrement, playlist_id integer references playlists on delete cascade, image_id integer references images on delete cascade)
create table images (id integer primary key autoincrement, hash text unique, name text, url text)
create table image_hotspots (id integer primary key autoincrement, image_hash text, left integer, top integer, width integer, height integer)
alter table playlists add column type integer not null default 0
create table image_ranks (id integer primary key autoincrement, image_hash text unique, rank integer)
alter table images add column width integer not null default -1
alter table images add column height integer not null default -1
